title: Signing in - everytime it ask for a new password then refuses to accept it - have to go through 15 (or minutes) changing passwords and still can't open Firefox.
content: Why do I have to change or make a new password every time I try to sign into Firefox - all my passwords have been deleted and then don't work the next time I try to sign in. Also I have the same e-mail address since 1968, yet now yahoo/firefox doesn't recognize it ?
creator: utoyca

title: Multi Account Container Tab Cookies Exception
content:
I have the Multi Account Container Extension I also have "Clear cookies and site data when Firefox is closed" checked

How to add a cookie exception for a container? I can add cookies exceptions but they apply to whole browser, I don't want youtube cookies stored in my browser when using default container. I want them stored only in youtube container
creator: firefoxacc.tus6e

title: ¿Cómo deshabilito que la ventana de descargas se abra automáticamente?
content:
Cuando descargo algo, el documento se abre automáticamente, cortando el flujo cuando necesito descargar muchos archivos.

¿Habrá alguna forma de desactivar esta función?, para que no se abra cada vez que descargo algo
creator: danielita_dlm

title: [Macbook, Ventura] Friefox always opens .pdf's in a new window and not in a new tab.
content:
Hello,

I searched the web for answers but couldn't find any. I set firefox to be the default app to open .pdf-files on my macbook. And everytime I open a file, firefox opens a new window.

How can I make sure that a .pdf-file opens in the current window as a new tab?

On Safari this works as intended. On every other OS this works as intedend.

Thanks for time.
creator: julian.hinrichs44
